messages.title: Huge surge of support for Lib Dem Elizabeth Riches
messages.content: Local residents are backing experienced local champion Elizabeth Riches to be our next MP. Voters in North East Fife voted to elect Willie Rennie as their Liberal Democrat MSP last year and at the council elections on May. the Liberal Democrats topped the poll in North East Fife, with the SNP in second place. Elizabeth Riches said: 'I am so proud that so many people are joining the campaign every day.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Boost investment in education and improve the provision of mental health treatment.
Stand up for people in vital farming, fishing, and tourism industries as well as our world class University from the negative effects of Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voters in North East Fife voted to elect Willie Rennie as their Liberal Democrat MSP last year and at the council elections on May. The Liberal Democrats topped the poll in North East Fife, with the SNP in second place.

issues.brexitEurope: I will also use my experience to stand up for people here and protect our vital farming, fishing and tourism industries as well as our world class University from the negative effects of Brexit.
issues.education: I want to boost investment in education.
issues.health: Improve the provision of mental health treatment.

endorsements.endorsement: Willie Rennie, North East Fife's MSP and Leader of the Scottish Liberal Democrats and Tim Farron are backing the experienced Elizabeth Riches to be our next MP.

quotes.text: I am so proud that so many people are joining the campaign every day.

examples: Voters in North East Fife voted to elect Willie Rennie as their Liberal Democrat MSP last year and at the council elections on May. The Liberal Democrats topped the poll in North East Fife, with the SNP in second place.
I am so proud that so many people are joining the campaign every day.
Local residents are backing experienced local champion Elizabeth Riches to be our next MP.
This election is an opportunity to change the direction of our country. The Liberal Democrats have a positive vision for Scotland and the United Kingdom.
Stand up for people in vital farming, fishing, and tourism industries as well as our world class University from the negative effects of Brexit.
I want to boost investment in education.
Improve the provision of mental health treatment.

personalStories.story: Local residents are backing experienced local champion Elizabeth Riches to be our next MP.

examples: Willie Rennie, North East Fife's MSP and Leader of the Scottish Liberal Democrats and Tim Farron are backing the experienced Elizabeth Riches to be our next MP.
Elizabeth Riches to be North East Fife's next MP
